SH Podcast #1 for 01-01-07 http://www.shakespearehigh.com/pac/podcast/SH-01_01-01-07.mp3 Welcome to the first Shakespeare High Podcast! Check out the show notes in the Shakespeare High Cafeteria (http://www.shakespearehigh.com/cafeteria/). Mon, 01 Jan 2007 08:55:41 +0000
Tutorial #4--Shakespeare 101 http://www.shakespearehigh.com/pac/podcast/SH_Tutorial_04.mp3 This tutorial covers the Shakespeare 101 student guide with audio examples of Old, Middle, and Early Modern English. Links to the original audio files can be found on SH. Open http://www.shakespearehigh.com/ before beginning the tutorial. Sun, 02 Jul 2006 21:16:38 +0000
Tutorial #3--SH Student Area http://www.shakespearehigh.com/pac/podcast/SH_Tutorial_03.mp3 The third podcast in the Shakespeare High tutorial series discusses the student study area, including the play guides and Shakespeare's life handout. Before starting the tutorial audio file, click on http://www.shakespearehigh.com/ so that you will be ready to begin. Sun, 02 Jul 2006 03:21:39 +0000
Tutorial #2 Blooper http://www.shakespearehigh.com/pac/podcast/SH_Tutorial_02_Blooper.mp3 Skype and the perils of podcasting! Sun, 25 Jun 2006 07:19:59 +0000
Tutorial #2--The SH Cafeteria http://www.shakespearehigh.com/pac/podcast/SH_Tutorial_02.mp3 The second podcast in the Shakespeare High tutorial series discusses the Cafeteria discussion board. Through this tutorial, you will explore the SH Cafeteria and learn how to keep yourself safe on the Internet. Before starting the tutorial audio file, click on http://www.shakespearehigh.com/ so that you will be ready to begin. Mon, 26 Jun 2006 00:09:11 +0000
Tutorial #1--An Introduction http://www.shakespearehigh.com/pac/podcast/SH_Tutorial_01.mp3 This tutorial outlines the Shakespeare High tutorial series and how to navigate the main page at http://www.shakespearehigh.com/. To get the most out of the tutorial, you should listen to it while sitting in front of your computer and looking at the main page of Shakespeare High. Thu, 22 Jun 2006 06:05:11 +0000
